member.name: COPYFILE2_COPY_PHASE
member.summary: Indicates the phase of a copy at the time of an error. This is used in theError structure embedded in the structure.

member.name: COPYFILE2_COPY_PHASE.COPYFILE2_PHASE_NONE
member.summary: The copy had not yet started processing.

member.name: COPYFILE2_COPY_PHASE.COPYFILE2_PHASE_PREPARE_SOURCE
member.summary: The source was being prepared including opening a handle to the source. This phase happens once per stream copy operation.

member.name: COPYFILE2_COPY_PHASE.COPYFILE2_PHASE_PREPARE_DEST
member.summary: The destination was being prepared including opening a handle to the destination. This phase happens once per stream copy operation.

member.name: COPYFILE2_COPY_PHASE.COPYFILE2_PHASE_READ_SOURCE
member.summary: The source file was being read. This phase happens one or more times per stream copy operation.

member.name: COPYFILE2_COPY_PHASE.COPYFILE2_PHASE_WRITE_DESTINATION
member.summary: The destination file was being written. This phase happens one or more times per stream copy operation.

member.name: COPYFILE2_COPY_PHASE.COPYFILE2_PHASE_SERVER_COPY
member.summary: Both the source and destination were on the same remote server and the copy was being processed remotely. This phase happens once per stream copy operation.

member.name: COPYFILE2_COPY_PHASE.COPYFILE2_PHASE_NAMEGRAFT_COPY
member.summary: The copy operation was processing symbolic links and/or reparse points. This phase happens once per file copy operation.

member.name: COPYFILE2_COPY_PHASE.COPYFILE2_PHASE_MAX
member.summary: One greater than the maximum value. Valid values for this enumeration will be less than this value.
